bugs.summary: Update dav1d to new version 3fd2ad938ace8d2d0ab86e4108d46a7722691073 from 2021-11-01 15:14:21
WPT test translate-interpolation.html fails in Firefox
Simplify chrome vs content handling in nsWindowWatcher::OpenWindowInternal
Standardize the condition for opening popup from window.open, and BarProp values
Disable bfcache when active lock/request exists in SharedWorker
Move some classes in EditorUtils.h used only by HTMLEditor to new file
Stop supporting Gecko specific commands of `Document.execCommand` if possible
Make `HTMLEditor::JoinNodesWithTransaction()` return error if cannot join given nodes
Factor out RecompileScriptEventListeners
Allow for more than 64 synced fields in SyncedContext
Update tests within browser/components/originattributes/test/browser to work with https-first enabled
Add options to capture samples/cpu/markers on all registered threads
Switch a bunch of IntRects to LayerRects.
Don't bother storing the group bounds.

canvas.toDataURI() takes 3x as long in Firefox as in Chrome (with most time spent in MOZ_Z_deflate_slow)

Handle out-of-bounds accesses on lazy arguments better

Wasm heaps should be able to grow to maxBufferByteLength, not maxBufferByteLength - 64K
Line wrap fails when word separator is U+2E31; text goes past line limit
Minor APZ cleanup
Update RLBox so that locks aren't used for app_pointer in single threaded contexts
Ensure DetachArchiveDatabase is called in error case.
sdpSemantics is not appearing in about:webrtc
Enable window occlusion on Nightly on Windows
Downloading files onto mapped network drives fails
List xhtml pages (application/xhtml+xml) also in HTML filter

Remove OS.File usage from various browser/ tests

Need to reset `gK32ExportsResolveOnce` after `gSharedSection` is updated
Define schema for configuration file
